attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCC8R8enCYcAsYay75O_description
attribs.current:
[[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]]

These numbers may be arranged in any order.
If you dont like these stats you may do 27-point buy with this calculator: http://1-dot-encounter-planner.appspot.com/point-buy-calculator.html

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCC8zXWnXUzinvvkxqo_description
attribs.current:
Make a token on http://rolladvantage.com/tokenstamp/ upload the token as your character image, and change the character name with this format:

PC Name (Game ID)

This is so the character can be assigned to you and a token can be made even while you are offline. if you fail to follow these instructions the character will eventually get deleted.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LHjzeyn6a-lLxY37EcP_description
attribs.current:
Defense
While you are wearing armor, you gain a +1 bonus to AC.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LHk-85P43K6XhQBd06t_description
attribs.current:
Second Wind
You have a limited well of stamina that you can draw on to protect yourself from harm. On Your Turn, you can use a Bonus Action to regain Hit Points equal to 1d10 + your fighter level.

Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or Long Rest before you can use it again.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LHk45Si2nEXNF1UOpxp_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d8, Damage Type: Bludgeoning

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LHkAV1thg4OCN3ChByl_description
attribs.current: Lucky: When you roll a 1 on The D20 for an Attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LHkBLax57SbpbTz3lXj_description
attribs.current: Brave: You have advantage on Saving Throws against being Frightened.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LHkBSGib1Abxymggjnc_description
attribs.current: Halfling Nimbleness: You can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than yours.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LHkBiuoFo71gOS0pEyb_description
attribs.current: You have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage.

attribs.current:
Includes:

 a backpack

 a bedroll

 a mess kit

 a tinderbox

 10 torches

 10 days of rations

 a waterskin

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LHp6njTsdJp4h0aR-sl_description
attribs.current: You know the secret patterns and flow to cities and can find passages through the urban sprawl that others would miss. When you are not in combat, you (and companions you lead) can travel between any two locations in the city twice as fast as your speed would normally allow.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LHp82SXFgu5Fh-mTsGW_itemcontent
attribs.current: This set of tools includes a small file, a set of lock picks, a small mirror mounted on a metal handle, a set of narrow-bladed scissors, and a pair of pliers. Proficiency with these tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to disarm traps or open locks.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LHpC81IkUlGoMQ9TWJy_itemcontent
attribs.current:
Ammunition: You can use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a ranged attack only if you have ammunition to fire from the weapon. Each time you attack with the weapon, you expend one piece of ammunition. Drawing the ammunition from a quiver, case, or other container is part of the attack. At the end of the battle, you can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search the battlefield.

If you use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a melee attack, you treat the weapon as an improvised weapon (see "Improvised Weapons" later in the section). A sling must be loaded to deal any damage when used in this way.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LHpC81IkUlGoMQ9TWJy_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Ranged Weapon, Damage: 1d8, Damage Type: Piercing, Range: 80/320

attribs.current: Ammunition: You can use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a ranged attack only if you have ammunition to fire from the weapon. Each time you attack with the weapon, you expend one piece of ammunition. Drawing the ammunition from a quiver, case, or other container is part of the attack. At the end of the battle, you can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search the battlefield.

attribs.name: personality_traits
attribs.current:
I always look out for the underdog. I help the downtrodden whenever possible.
I eat like I don't know when I will see my next meal.

attribs.name: ideals
attribs.current: It is the responsibility of the strong to help the weak whenever possible.

attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current: A knight sacrificed his life to save mine. I took up his shield, and vowed to use it to protect others.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LHwbBemNahHE4DP7KHP_itemcontent
attribs.current: Made of interlocking metal rings, chain mail includes a layer of quilted fabric worn underneath the mail to prevent chafing and to cushion the impact of blows. The suit includes gauntlets.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LHwbGLr3FfuPaqXpjQh_itemcontent
attribs.current: A shield is made from wood or metal and is carried in one hand. Wielding a shield increases your Armor Class by 2. You can benefit from only one shield at a time.
